scripts.docs:check: node tools/check-docs.mjs && node tools/check-doc-format.mjs --warn && npm run check:reachability && npm run ai:check
scripts.check:all: node tools/check-docs.mjs && node tools/check-doc-format.mjs --warn && node tools/check-doc-reachability.mjs && npm run ai:check && node tools/check-file-size.mjs && node tools/check-headers.mjs && node tools/check-dependencies.mjs && node tools/check-umd.mjs && node tools/check-naming.mjs && node tools/check-patterns.mjs
scripts.check:strict: npm run check:all && npm run test:coverage:check
